name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer with extensive experience in delivering cloud-native applications utilizing **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **React**, and **Angular** for exceptional user experiences. Proficient in **.NET** and **C#** for backend services, focusing on microservices architecture and containerization. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines and monitoring solutions to enhance performance and reliability. Adept at debugging and optimizing distributed systems while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams across sectors like healthcare, eCommerce, and finance. Committed to developing clean, efficient code that drives significant impact through automation and robust architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained cloud-native microservices architecture using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **.NET** frameworks, ensuring high performance and scalability across various applications.
• Leveraged **React** and **Angular** for responsive UI/UX design, optimizing user interactions and achieving a 30% reduction in task completion times.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, successfully reducing deployment times by **80%** and enhancing release cycles.
• Designed and integrated RESTful APIs using **Spring Data JPA** and **OAuth2**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and securing electronic health records (EHR).
• Containerized applications employing **Docker**, facilitating seamless staging and production deployments, while ensuring consistency and reliability.
• Orchestrated services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, achieving **99.9%** uptime and efficient load management with **Redis** caching.
• Developed a robust notification system using **RabbitMQ**, ensuring **99%** timely alert delivery for critical system events.
• Collaborated effectively within a distributed team environment, enhancing processes through regular performance monitoring and debugging strategies.

Utilized **Java** (Spring Boot), **Node.js**, and **TypeScript** to develop robust backend services, reducing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
Engineered a cloud-native notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
Developed a customer insights dashboard leveraging **React**, **Vue.js**, and **D3.js**, which improved resolution rates by **20%**.
Implemented CI/CD practices using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a reliable and consistent release process.
Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** with **Docker** and **Terraform**, resulting in a **50%** reduction in infrastructure setup time.
Emphasized performance optimization and debugging throughout development to enhance application efficiency in a distributed environment.

• Developed dynamic web applications using **Angular** and **TypeScript**, enhancing user experience and achieving loading speed improvements by **40%**.
• Built and maintained backend **REST APIs** utilizing **Java (Spring Boot)**, **Hibernate**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring a **98%** uptime.
• Implemented **microservices** architecture to enhance system connectivity and scalability.
• Led testing frameworks using **JUnit** and **Mockito**, successfully reducing bugs by **30%**.
• Optimized application performance through **CI/CD** practices and **containers**, contributing to significant efficiency while deploying updates.
• Deployed global solutions with **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring low-latency access and robust performance.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **developer tools** for enhanced monitoring and debugging capabilities in a **cloud-native** environment.
